Signing up with a social account completes registration automatically.
You can add additional information afterwards.

auth.termsPersonalAgree: I agree to the Privacy Policy.
auth.termsServiceRequired: You must agree to the Terms of Service.
auth.termsPersonalRequired: You must agree to the Privacy Policy.
auth.findIdDescription: Enter your name and date of birth to find your registered email.
auth.findPasswordDescription: Enter your name, date of birth, and email to receive a verification code.
auth.resetPasswordCodeStep: Enter the verification code sent to {{email}}.
auth.toastGoogleLoginUnavailable: Unable to start Google login. Please try again later.
auth.toastResetPasswordPageSuccess: Password changed. Please log in again.
auth.toastInvalidAccess: Invalid access. Please use a valid link.
auth.toastTooManyAttempts: Too many attempts detected. Please try again later.
auth.toastSocialAccountNoPassword: Social login accounts do not need password reset.
auth.toastCodeSendFailed: Failed to send verification code. Please try again later.
auth.validationEmailFormat: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.validationPasswordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.statusForbidden: This account has been blocked. Please contact the administrator.
auth.statusLocked: This account has been blocked. Please contact the administrator.
auth.statusTooMany: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
auth.verifyEmailNoEmail: No email information. Please sign up first.
auth.toastEmailVerified: Email verified successfully. Please log in.
auth.toastVerificationCodeSent: Verification code has been sent to your email.
auth.toastTooManyVerifyAttempts: Too many verification attempts. Please try again later.
auth.toastTooManyResendRequests: Too many resend requests. Please try again later.
auth.oauthPasswordWarning: Accounts created via social login (Google, etc.) do not have a password. Please log in using the social service.
auth.noAttemptsRemaining: You've reached the send limit. Please try again later.

home.heroTitle:
A New Beginning
in Korean Learning
home.heroDescription:
From videos to study materials to 1:1 lessons,
experience effective and enjoyable Korean learning.
home.featureDescription: Improve your Korean effectively with a systematic curriculum and diverse learning tools.
home.videoLearningDescription: Naturally improve your listening and speaking skills through Korean videos on various topics.
home.structuredLearningDescription: Systematically learn grammar, vocabulary, and expressions through step-by-step curriculum.
home.lessonDescription: Quickly improve your skills with personalized lessons from expert instructors.
home.ctaSectionDescription:
Sign up and try our free content.
A new Korean learning experience awaits you.

about.heroDescription:
Providing effective and enjoyable learning experiences
for Korean learners worldwide.
about.missionDescription1: Amazing Korean was created to provide the best learning experience for Korean learners around the world.
about.missionDescription2: We help everyone learn Korean easily and effectively through cutting-edge educational technology and expert content.
about.coreValuesDescription: The values that Amazing Korean pursues.
about.valueEffectiveDesc: Maximize learning outcomes with proven teaching methods and systematic curriculum.
about.valueLearnerDesc: Provide personalized learning experiences tailored to each learner's goals and level.
about.valueGlobalDesc: Lower learning barriers with an online platform accessible anytime, anywhere.
about.ctaDescription: Learning Korean is fun with Amazing Korean.

study.listDescription: Systematically improve your Korean skills through program-specific study problems. From pronunciation to TOPIK, we provide diverse learning content.
study.emptyDescription: There are no study problems for the selected program yet.
study.emptyDetailDescription: No problems have been registered for this study yet.
study.voiceNotice: Please type your answer instead of voice input.
study.completionDescription: Thank you for solving all the problems.
study.notFoundDescription: This problem does not exist or has been deleted.

lesson.listDescription: Learn Korean step by step through systematically organized lessons. We provide integrated lessons with videos, problems, and assignments.
lesson.emptyDescription: New lessons will be added soon.
lesson.emptyItemsDescription: No learning items have been registered for this lesson yet.
lesson.notFoundDescription: This lesson does not exist or has been deleted.

video.listDescription: Learn naturally through Korean videos on various topics. Watch and listen to native pronunciation and expressions to improve your skills.
video.notFoundDescription: This video does not exist or has been deleted.
video.completionDescription: Great job! Keep up the learning.
video.allItemsCompleted: All items in "{{title}}" have been completed!

Please try again later.
error.errorPageContact: If the problem persists, please contact the administrator.
error.notFoundDescription:
The page you requested does not exist
or may have been moved.
error.notFoundCheckUrl: Please check that the URL is correct.
error.accessDeniedDescription:
You do not have permission to access this page.
This page requires administrator privileges.
error.accessDeniedContact: If you believe this is an error, please contact the administrator.
